reviews.review: Awesome game, neat puzzles, great introduction to the Portal concepts.

Kesinlikle (benim gibi) puzzle oyunları çok sevmeseniz de ölmeden önce oynanması gereken oyunlardan biri. Evet biraz kısa ama her anından zevk alıyorsunuz hele de plot twist yaptıktan sonra.Oyunun düşüncesinin yanında özellikle GLaDOS'un konuşmaları ve duvarda bizden önceki bir deneğin yazıp çizdikleri çok güzel düşünülmüş.

A very different game with an interesting story, amazing graphics and an easy-to-get-used-to gameplay.
Hands down, one of the best games of all time !!!

Excelente juego de puzzles en primera persona, incluye una buena historia y dialogos ingeniosos y muy divertidos. Aunque no llego a utilizar todo su potencial hasta la magnifica secuela es un muy buen juego lo recomiendo.

8/10
jogo fantastico para quem gosta de puzzle,jogabilidade e a mecanica do jogo são muito boas

A wise man named Yahtzee Crosshaw once said, "Portal is great and if you don't think so you must be stupid." I am inclined to agree. Admittedly it is a bit short, but in my opinion, it's the perfect length for a game like this. I am very pleased with portal, and you will be too, unless you're stupid.
Oyun süper herkes almalı

…это всего лишь сон: снится, как ты падаешь в никуда – пусть даже ведомо куда, и все же, приходит страх падения, который призывает мозг пробудится от неизвестного; а вот она игра Portal, которая позволяет все же упасть и остаться в живых, двигаться дальше и тем самым пробуждая все больший и желаемый интерес к неизвестному. Portal – как возможность приблизится к природе страха высоты и падения, как и в снах, так и в реальной жизни.
…также, у меня игра вызывает покалывание в животе… мне забавно это ощущение и, так редко встречаемое в реальной жизни – затяжные прыжки и затяжные приземления – не важно, какая на то высота, расстояние и препятствие, в этой игре, все это есть – ничто. 
…перемещения предметов и самих себя в пространстве – без проблем, стоит только пробудить мозг и использовать все эти возможности в пользу для прохождения задания и тем самым продвигаться далее.
Атмосфера в игре подпитываемая как всегда умной и приятной музыкой, замечательная и в тот же момент пугающая – чувство одиночества, чувство чего-то покинутого, отдаленного и неизведанного.
Здесь нет возможности кого-то убить, только как убить самого себя (героя игры).
Здесь потеря в пространстве и здесь, искусство падения.
Здесь первый и второй портал открывают третий портал, который дает маленькую возможность играющему заглянуть внутрь самого себя.
…это всего лишь игра в бесконечном переплете реальных игр человечества.

It's kinda hard to describe this game. I think the best description to this is magical...
It's a short game though very worth it, Portal is a puzzle game that I have no hesitation in recomending.

Для меня Portal - это лишь не большой пролог к большой и замечательной во всех отношениях Portal 2. Я начал знакомство с этой серией именно с Portal 2, но советую сначала пройти "пролог". Игра для своего времени революционная поэтому 8/10

This game was amazing.It left me with an open mouth when I played it.It filled be with many emotions,and the puzzles,the plot!They all fit in perfectly.I can't wait until I get my hands on Portal 2,so that the adventure can go on.I hope the people who read this play it too,so they can experience the amazing moments I went through.For me,it was an amazing game,and I hope it is your opinion too!

Portal je skvělá logická hra s nejcharismatičtějším záporákem co sem kdy měl tu čest poznat :) (GLaDOS). Tato hra byla původně vydaná jako bonus zdarma k jiné hře a její délka (příběh dokončíte asi za dvě hodiny) tomu odpovídá. Ale už jen fakt, že se hráčům tak líbila, že si vydupali druhý díl, ukazuje na kvality této hry.  Jediné co bych jí možná vytknul jsou občasné záseky co jsem při hraní měl, ale ty nebyly tak časté aby jakkoli snížili celkový pocit ze hry. Hratoelnost je skvělá, úrovně nápadité a třešničkou na dortu (ano ten ikonický DORT!) je písnička po dohrání hry..... Tuhle hru jsem si fakt užil a okamžitě jdu na dvojku, kterou doporučuji zakoupit zárověň s prvním dílem. Finální verdikt: 9/10 (bod je za krátkou kampaň a záseky)
传送门的名气不用多说，一句话来总结就是，从已知走向未知。非常有意思的游戏，不对拼的Fps，虽然说第一部不算难，但是这个类型很赞。

Great choice. Its a short game, yes, but it is very worth while. After completing the main "campaign" so to say, i was thrilled with the overall storyline of the game, and theres many challenge levels that remain to be played after :D
Very overhyped game, not worth its price

Portal is an excellent example of how to make a puzzle game fun for not only hardcore gamers but also casuals. The storytelling is a bit slow for me however, the dialogue from GLaDOS gives the game a humorous tone that makes the game stand out in Valve's library of FPS's. But at the core of this title is it's gimmick of portals, which are cleverly used throughout most of the game's length. Beware though if you do not plan to play any of the bonus content you are look at about 4 hours of solid gameplay, but that is excused by its price tag.

The first playthrough wasn't the funnest in my opinion, It's the second-third time for me. Not sure why but I like replaying this more than just playing it. This game is a surprise sleeper hit! It can easily be beaten in an hour or two depending on how quickly you grasp the concept and puzzles. I loved the sense of humor the game has throughout its play through. What I loved the most is the sense that there is an untold story throughot. You get the sense that something happened before you awake in the testing chamber and as you progress, you start to see that you weren't the only one to have gone through the tests. This game felt like a demo for something that has the potential of being something bigger.

[b]Portal é um jogo de ação/puzzle em primeira pessoa desenvolvido pela Valve Corporation. O jogo foi lançado em um pacote chamado The Orange Box para PC e Xbox 360 em 9 de outubro de 2007, e para PlayStation3 em 11 de dezembro do mesmo ano. Para a versão para PC a como comprar separadamente via o Steam.[/b]

[b][HISTORIA][/b]
Em Portal você controla Chell(Pouco se sabe sobre ela), que acorda em uma Cúpula de Relaxamento na Aperture Science uma empresa que é responsável pela criação da Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device (Arma de Portais) . Depois de um momento explorando o lugar Chell é surpreendida por uma voz feminina, essa voz era de GLaDOS(Assistente de Pesquisa e sistema Operacional em Disco Artificialmente Inteligente) que apresenta o lugar a Chell e também apresenta a Arma de Portais, diz que terá que passar por 19 testes, para encorajá-la diz para CHELL que no final do teste 19 ganhará um BOLO... ,  O problema é que com o passar do tempo, Chell percebe a verdadeira intenção de GLaDOS... com informações achadas nas partes finais do jogo e juntado com a intenção de GLaDOS, Chell poderia ter descoberto a causa do possível abandono desse centro de pesquisa que parece estar deserto e o pouco de sua história...

[b][GRÁFICO][/b]
Portal utiliza o motor gráfico SOURCE, mesmo motor utilizado em TEAM FORTRESS 2, CS GO, HALF LIFE 2...
Eu resumo o gráfico de PORTAL em uma palavra, BALANCEADO. O porque da palavra balanceado, é por causa que em portal tudo é bem feito. Todos os aspectos se igualam, ou seja nem chega ao ponto de ser ÓTIMO e muito menos de ser PÉSSIMO. É maneiro =D.

[b][JOGABILIDADE][/b]
Primeira coisa que tenho que citar que é uma coisa ótima na jogabilidade do PORTAL é a física. Os comandos são muito fáceis de pegar. Muitos falam que o jogo é curto, sim é curto, mas por ser um jogo do gênero PUZZLE, a duração vai contar mais de acordo com sua facilidade de resolver os PUZZLEs isso claro se for a primeira vez jogando, agora você rejogando, com certeza vai achar que é curto. Antes de você comprar esse jogo a primeira coisa que você deve ver é se VOCÊ tem PACIÊNCIA, por que vai ter parte no jogo que ele vai ter "pedir" Agilidade e PACIÊNCIA, exemplo: Em algumas fases você terá que criar um "3º portal" para lhe dar impulso para passar sobre um barreira, esse "3º Portal" você terá que criar quando você tiver caindo... Não entendeu ? Jogue, Mas antes tenha em mente que PACIÊNCIA é chave para "comprar" e "jogar" esse jogo, ele não é um jogo difícil, as vezes a falta de paciência acaba tornando as coisas fácies em difíceis.

[b][ÁUDIO][/b]
Em questão de fala, os únicos que falam nesse jogo são os Dróides e a GLaDOS. OS efeitos sonoros são bons, Melhor Áudio do jogo, é a voz da GLaDOS.  

Fiz um vídeo, que tem uma música que descreve muito sobre o jogo, assista: 
http://youtu.be/fCz6kxygs9k
[b]☑ FINALIZADO---------------------------------------------------------------NOTA: 8.5 [/b]

Really immersive, and impressive; I wasn't sure how much I would like this game, since, as I understood it, it was almost purely a puzzle game - I usually tend to play games for the characters, or plot. But Portal totally blew me away. The puzzles were great, of course, and immensely satisfying to complete; and the storyline was fascinating. Quite dark, really, but that was a good part of what made it so very enjoyable.
Plus, GLaDOS is just great. Honestly. Such an interesting concept for a character, pulled off really well. She made me cry with laughter at points, too.

And, tbh, the entire game is worth it for The Song.

[b][i]Porta[/b]l[/i] is an absolutely fantastic game. It is an example of what games can be and what games should be, especially puzzle game. [b]The mechanics and feel are entirely unique, and yet comfortably familiar.[/b] The game brilliantly teaches you the mechanics right from the first from, it never moves too quickly or too slowly, constantly providing a wonderful engaging training free of literal tutorials. You are awaken in the testing centers for the ethically-questionable scientific R&D company, Aperture Science. The facility is run by a cynical, dry, sarcastic AI, GLaDOS, whose halarious monologue provides a wonderful direction and build-up for the story. There are plenty of easter eggs and [i]Half Life[/i] references, as well as a healthy set of achievements. If you've finally become bored with the rest of the game, there is also a developer commentary mode included which provides lots of brilliant insight and knowledge about the process of development and principles of game design imployed in [i]Portal[/i].

For anyone who already loves this game, I recommend some of Valve's other closely related titles such as the many entires in the [i]Half Life[/i] series, and of course [i]Portal 2[/i], the sequel to this game which sports a wonderful co-op mode in addition to its single-player.
finished it it was amazing best game ever 10/10

I got to try this pretty late, and still managed to know very little of it. I was pleasantly surprised. The story was pretty short, but felt the right size for the story involved. Pros and cons:

Pros:
-innovative ways to progess forward
-gives you necessary information, but lets you make the decisions on how to proceed
-the robots, the levels, all that goes on is hilariously wrong and polished at the same time, including voice acting that makes you smile every time.
-the cake <3

Cons:
-it's really hard to think of anything to say. This really kept challenging me to find solutions in a fun way. Maybe the last levels could have shown a little more diversity and the end battle could have beed a little harder, but at no point this ceased to be one of the most fun titles i've seen.
